field.name: summary
field.value: Dynamic Proxy does not allow proxying of COM objects

field.name: description
field.value:
When creating a proxy (for interface, with target or target interface, although I guess only the latter makes sense here), ProxyGenerator checks if the target is assignable to the interface type, and throws if it does not. The check fails for com objects (ones that show up in the debugger as "System.__ComObject").
It should explicitly check if it's dealing with COM object and adjust the check appropriately before throwing.
